mapper.sql: id, business_party_mark AS businessPartyMark, name, remark, is_del AS isDel, create_user AS createUser, create_time AS createTime, update_user AS updateUser, update_time AS updateTime
mapper.select: SELECT a.id AS id, a.business_party_mark AS businessPartyMark, a.name AS `name`, a.type AS type, case a.type when 1 THEN '嵌入式' else '调入式' end AS typeName, a.is_del AS isDel, a.remark AS remark, a.create_time AS createTime FROM t_out_side_bpm_business_party a WHERE a.is_del = 0
SELECT a.business_party_mark FROM t_out_side_bpm_business_party a WHERE a.is_del = 0 AND id = #{id}

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM t_out_side_bpm_business_party a WHERE (a.business_party_mark = #{businessPartyMark} OR a.name = #{name}) AND a.is_del = 0
AND a.id <> #{id}
